DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Top 10 Executors
Top 10 Projects
Re-Work Analysis
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters: [{"WidgetSubTitle":"Re-Work per Department, Client & Project","WidgetType":"pivotGrid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetHeight":"","WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Jobs","metricFieldValue":"JobsGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"queryText","value":"select v.*, (sum(v.Jobs) over (Partition by Department)) JobsPerDepartment, (sum(v.Jobs) over (Partition by Client)) JobsPerClient, (sum(v.Jobs) over ()) JobsGrandTotal from ( select v.CommercialClient as Client, v.Department, v.Project, sum(1) as Jobs from SkillAnalyticsReWork v, UserUsers_CompanyCompanies uucc where (1 = 1) /*[DateFilter]*/ and cast(v.[ModifiedOn] as Date) between @FromDate and @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/ and uucc.Users = @CurrentUserId and uucc.Companies = v.CompanyId and Exists(select ccc.CommercialClient from CommercialClientCompany ccc, UserUsers_CompanyCompanies uucc where ccc.Company = uucc.Companies and uucc.Users = @CurrentUserId and ccc.CommercialClient = v.CommercialClientId) group by v.CommercialClient, v.Department, v.Project ) v","mapping":""}},"QueryConfiguration":{}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Reasons
